creator: Hine, Lewis Wickes, 1874-1940
reproduction_number: LC-DIG-nclc-02212 (color digital file from b&w original print)
title: At side of mill gate (western gate beside office) Manuel Andrew, 14 Windsor St. Smallest in the picture; apparently under 14. See #2290. Manuel Jason, 58 First St. Thinnest in the picture; red stripped [sic] shirt; induced previous boy to give his name and interpreted for him. See #2288. Lewis Grace, 68 Acushnet Ave., works in drawing-in room. See #2285. John Bachman, 22 Nelson St. Probably over 14. See #2287.  Location: New Bedford, Massachusetts.
